name: Garner the Mighty - Pew Pew Pirates
name_original: Garner the Mighty - Pew Pew Pirates
description:
YO HO, its your local pirate crew, Garner the Mightyy! YARRRRRRR! 

We bring y'all this treasure of a game that ye may sail the seven seas searching for treasurrre, but BEWARE of the numerous dangers out at sea that will put a dampener on ye journey, YARRRRRRR! 
Think ye can handle the fierce treacheries of the deep blue and become true pirates like we merry few gamers?? YARRRRRRR! 

PLAY NOW and prove yer worth!! YARRRRRRR!
